pcook01

Class RideManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcook01.RideManager

  • public class RideManager
extends java.lang.Object
    RideManager is used to keep track and update all objects involved in an Uber ride. Once a ride is requested a RideManager is created for that ride and the Uber experience begins
    Author:
    Patrick Cook

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RideManager(Ride ride)
      Default constructor for creating a RideManager

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Used to collect user ratings.

      The starting point for every Uber ride.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RideManager

        public RideManager(Ride ride)
        Default constructor for creating a RideManager
        Parameters:
        ride - - ride that is specific to this manager

    • Method Detail

      • startRide

        public void startRide()
        The starting point for every Uber ride. Responsible for simulating driver pickup, ride duration and ride completion using timers. All user attributes are updated once the ride has been completed

      • collectRatings

        public void collectRatings()
        Used to collect user ratings. Currently rating collection defaults to a randomized function. However userCollectRating() can be swapped in to allow for user input

      • logRide

        public void logRide()
        Helper function used to log the ride. The ride information is appended to the uber_logs.json file or the file is created if it does not exist.
